App.Name: Hexamer
App.SymmetricKey: Symmetric key here (formatted as a Guid: xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx)
App.SlackClientId: Your Slack App Client Id obtained from api.slack.com
App.SlackSecret: Your Slack App Secret obtained from api.slack.com
App.SlackTeamId: Your Slack Team Id you're trying to authenticate on. This can be left empty, for it is optional.
